Arizona Winter School 2002
General Information

General Information

  • Title: “Periods”
  • Dates: March 9-13, 2002
  • Location: The University of Arizona
  • Organizers: Felipe Voloch, Wayne Raskind, Dinesh Thakur, and Douglas Ulmer

Speakers and Courses

(The links below lead to the corresponding sections of the notes page.)
  • Johan de Jong: “Variation of Hodge Structures: some examples”
  • Pierre Deligne: “Periods for the Fundamental Group”
  • Fernando Rodriguez Villegas: “Periods and special values of L-functions”
  • Claire Voisin: “Hodge theory and filtrations on Chow groups”

Professional Development Component

The professional development component was on the use of technology (such as the web, spreadsheets, and a calculator based laboratory) in the classroom.
